name: Some day we'll fly
description:
Game created for weekly game jam 161. Jam theme was "Pilot".

It's a wonky prototype created mostly in over one day as we've got some trouble with the team.

Credits:

Burn Robot - Artist | https://burntrobot.itch.io/

Dominik Babiński - Programmer and Audio | https://flushedale.itch.io/
